titleStmt.title: The first examinacio[n] of Anne Askewe latelye martired in Smythfelde, by the Romyshe popes vpholders, wyth the elucydacyon of Iohan Bale.
titleStmt.author: Askew, Anne, 1521-1546.
Bale, John, 1495-1563.
Askew, Anne, 1521-1546. Latter examynacyon of Anne Askewe latleye martyred in Smythfelde. aut

publicationStmt.pubPlace: [Imprynted at Marpurg in the lande of Hessen [i.e. London :

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon of part 1; part 2 colophon has date 1547.
The imprint is false; actual publication information from STC.
Another edition of STC 848 and 850 on continuous signatures--STC.
"The latter examynacyon of Anne Askewe latleye martyred in Smythfelde" has separate title page; register is continuous.
Reproduction of the original in Christ Church.
